   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: ct_surefire_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description:
   25: %%% Test cth_surefire hook
   26: %%%
   27: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(ct_surefire_SUITE).
   29: 
   30: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   31: 
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   34: 
   35: -include_lib("xmerl/include/xmerl.hrl").
   36: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   37: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   38: 
   39: -define(eh, ct_test_support_eh).
   40: 
   41: -define(url_base,"http://my.host.com/").
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% TEST SERVER CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: 
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% Description: Since Common Test starts another Test Server
   49: %% instance, the tests need to be performed on a separate node (or
   50: %% there will be clashes with logging processes etc).
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   53:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
   54:     Hook = "fail_pre_init_per_suite.erl",
   55:     io:format("Compiling ~p: ~p~n",
   56:         [Hook, compile:file(Hook,[{outdir,DataDir},debug_info])]),
   57:     ct_test_support:init_per_suite([{path_dirs,[DataDir]}|Config]).
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     ct_test_support:end_per_suite(Config).
   61: 
   62: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   63:     ct_test_support:init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   64: 
   65: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   66:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   67: 
   68: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   69: 
   70: all() ->
   71:     [
   72:      default,
   73:      absolute_path,
   74:      relative_path,
   75:      url,
   76:      logdir,
   77:      fail_pre_init_per_suite,
   78:      skip_init_per_group,
   79:      skip_case_in_spec,
   80:      skip_suite_in_spec
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% TEST CASES
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: 
   87: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %%%
   89: default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   90:     run(default,[cth_surefire],"junit_report.xml",Config).
   91: 
   92: absolute_path(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   93:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
   94:     Path = filename:join(PrivDir,"abspath.xml"),
   95:     run(absolute_path,[{cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config).
   96: 
   97: relative_path(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   98:     Path = "relpath.xml",
   99:     run(relative_path,[{cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config).
  100: 
  101: url(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     Path = "url.xml",
  103:     run(url,[{cth_surefire,[{url_base,?url_base},{path,Path}]}],
  104: 	Path,Config).
  105: 
  106: logdir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  107:     Opts = ct_test_support:get_opts(Config),
  108:     LogDir =
  109: 	case lists:keyfind(logdir,1,Opts) of
  110: 	    {logdir,LD} -> LD;
  111: 	    false -> ?config(priv_dir,Config)
  112: 	end,
  113:     MyLogDir = filename:join(LogDir,"specific_logdir"),
  114:     ensure_exists_empty(MyLogDir),
  115:     Path = "logdir.xml",
  116:     run(logdir,[{cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config,[{logdir,MyLogDir}]).
  117: 
  118: fail_pre_init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  120:     Suites = [filename:join(DataDir,"pass_SUITE"),
  121:               filename:join(DataDir,"fail_SUITE")],
  122:     Path = "fail_pre_init_per_suite.xml",
  123:     run(fail_pre_init_per_suite,[fail_pre_init_per_suite,
  124:         {cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config,[],Suites).
  125: 
  126: skip_init_per_group(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  128:     Suites = [filename:join(DataDir,"skip_init_per_group_SUITE")],
  129:     Path = "skip_group.xml",
  130:     run(skip_init_per_group,[{cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config,[],Suites).
  131: 
  132: skip_case_in_spec(Config) ->
  133:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  134:     Spec = filename:join(DataDir,"skip_one_case.spec"),
  135:     Path = "skip_case_in_spec.xml",
  136:     run_spec(skip_case_in_spec,[{cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config,Spec).
  137: 
  138: skip_suite_in_spec(Config) ->
  139:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  140:     Spec = filename:join(DataDir,"skip_one_suite.spec"),
  141:     Path = "skip_suite_in_spec.xml",
  142:     run_spec(skip_suite_in_spec,[{cth_surefire,[{path,Path}]}],Path,Config,Spec).
  143: 
  144: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  145: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
  146: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  147: run(Case,CTHs,Report,Config) ->
  148:     run(Case,CTHs,Report,Config,[]).
  149: 
  150: run(Case,CTHs,Report,Config,ExtraOpts) ->
  151:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  152:     Suite = filename:join(DataDir, "surefire_SUITE"),
  153:     run(Case,CTHs,Report,Config,ExtraOpts,Suite).
  154: 
  155: run(Case,CTHs,Report,Config,ExtraOpts,Suite) ->
  156:     Test = [{suite,Suite},{ct_hooks,CTHs},{label,Case}|ExtraOpts],
  157:     do_run(Case, Report, Test, Config).
  158: 
  159: run_spec(Case,CTHs,Report,Config,Spec) ->
  160:     Test = [{spec,Spec},{ct_hooks,CTHs},{label,Case}],
  161:     do_run(Case, Report, Test, Config).
  162: 
  163: do_run(Case, Report, RunTestOpts0, Config) ->
  164:     {RunTestOpts,ERPid} = setup(RunTestOpts0, Config),
  165:     ok = execute(Case, RunTestOpts, ERPid, Config),
  166:     LogDir =
  167: 	case lists:keyfind(logdir,1,RunTestOpts) of
  168: 	    {logdir,LD} -> LD;
  169: 	    false -> ?config(priv_dir,Config)
  170: 	end,
  171:     Re = filename:join([LogDir,"*",Report]),
  172:     check_xml(Case,Re).
  173: 
  174: setup(RunTestOpts0, Config) ->
  175:     Opts0 = ct_test_support:get_opts(Config),
  176:     Opts1 =
  177: 	case lists:keymember(logdir,1,RunTestOpts0) of
  178: 	    true -> lists:keydelete(logdir,1,Opts0);
  179: 	    false -> Opts0
  180: 	end,
  181:     Level = ?config(trace_level, Config),
  182:     EvHArgs = [{cbm,ct_test_support},{trace_level,Level}],
  183:     RunTestOpts = Opts1 ++ [{event_handler,{?eh,EvHArgs}}|RunTestOpts0],
  184:     ERPid = ct_test_support:start_event_receiver(Config),
  185:     {RunTestOpts,ERPid}.
  186: 
  187: execute(Case, RunTestOpts, ERPid, Config) ->
  188:     ok = ct_test_support:run(RunTestOpts, Config),
  189:     Events = ct_test_support:get_events(ERPid, Config),
  190:     ct_test_support:log_events(Case,
  191: 			       reformat(Events, ?eh),
  192: 			       ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  193: 			       RunTestOpts),
  194: 
  195:     TestEvents = events_to_check(Case),
  196:     ct_test_support:verify_events(TestEvents, Events, Config).
  197: 
  198: reformat(Events, EH) ->
  199:     ct_test_support:reformat(Events, EH).
  200: 
  201: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  202: %%% TEST EVENTS
  203: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  204: events_to_check(Test) ->
  205:     %% 2 tests (ct:run_test + script_start) is default
  206:     events_to_check(Test, 2).
  207: 
  208: events_to_check(_, 0) ->
  209:     [];
  210: events_to_check(Test, N) ->
  211:     test_events(Test) ++ events_to_check(Test, N-1).
  212: 
  213: test_suite_events(fail_SUITE, TestStat) ->
  214:      [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,init_per_suite}},
  215:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,init_per_suite,
  216:                    {failed,{error,pre_init_per_suite}}}},
  217:      {?eh,tc_auto_skip,
  218:       {fail_SUITE,test_case,
  219:        {failed,{ct_framework,init_per_suite,{failed,pre_init_per_suite}}}}},
  220:      {?eh,test_stats,TestStat},
  221:      {?eh,tc_auto_skip,
  222:       {ct_framework,end_per_suite,
  223:        {failed,{ct_framework,init_per_suite,{failed,pre_init_per_suite}}}}}].
  224: 
  225: test_suite_events(fail_SUITE) ->
  226:     test_suite_events(fail_SUITE, {0,0,{0,1}});
  227: test_suite_events(pass_SUITE) ->
  228:      [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,init_per_suite}},
  229:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,init_per_suite,ok}},
  230:      {?eh,tc_start,{pass_SUITE,test_case}},
  231:      {?eh,tc_done,{pass_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  232:      {?eh,test_stats,{1,0,{0,0}}},
  233:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,end_per_suite}},
  234:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,end_per_suite,ok}}];
  235: test_suite_events(skip_suite_in_spec) ->
  236:     [{?eh,tc_user_skip,{surefire_SUITE,all,"skipped in spec"}},
  237:      {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{1,0}}}];
  238: test_suite_events(skip_init_per_group_SUITE) ->
  239:     [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,init_per_suite}},
  240:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,init_per_suite,ok}},
  241: 
  242:      [{?eh,tc_start,
  243:        {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{init_per_group,root,[]}}},
  244:       {?eh,tc_done,
  245:        {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{init_per_group,root,[]},ok}},
  246:       [{?eh,tc_start,
  247:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{init_per_group,left,[]}}},
  248:        {?eh,tc_done,
  249:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,
  250:          {init_per_group,left,[]},
  251:          {skipped,skip_on_purpose}}},
  252:        {?eh,tc_user_skip,
  253:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{test_case,left},skip_on_purpose}},
  254:        {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{1,0}}},
  255:        {?eh,tc_user_skip,
  256:          {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{test_case,nested_group},skip_on_purpose}},
  257:        {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{2,0}}},
  258:        {?eh,tc_user_skip,
  259:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{end_per_group,left},skip_on_purpose}}],
  260: 
  261:       [{?eh,tc_start,
  262:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{init_per_group,right,[]}}},
  263:        {?eh,tc_done,
  264:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{init_per_group,right,[]},ok}},
  265:        {?eh,tc_start,{skip_init_per_group_SUITE,test_case}},
  266:        {?eh,tc_done,{skip_init_per_group_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  267:        {?eh,test_stats,{1,0,{2,0}}},
  268:        {?eh,tc_start,
  269:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{end_per_group,right,[]}}},
  270:        {?eh,tc_done,
  271:         {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{end_per_group,right,[]},ok}}],
  272:       {?eh,tc_start,
  273:        {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{end_per_group,root,[]}}},
  274:       {?eh,tc_done,
  275:        {skip_init_per_group_SUITE,{end_per_group,root,[]},ok}}],
  276: 
  277:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,end_per_suite}},
  278:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,end_per_suite,ok}}];
  279: test_suite_events(Test) ->
  280:     [{?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  281:      {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  282:      {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_ok}},
  283:      {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_ok,ok}},
  284:      {?eh,test_stats,{1,0,{0,0}}},
  285:      {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_fail}},
  286:      {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_fail,
  287: 		   {failed,{error,{test_case_failed,"this test should fail"}}}}},
  288:      {?eh,test_stats,{1,1,{0,0}}},
  289:      {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_badmatch}},
  290:      {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_badmatch,
  291:                    {failed,{error,{{badmatch,nok},'_'}}}}},
  292:      {?eh,test_stats,{1,2,{0,0}}}] ++
  293:         tc_skip_events(Test,undefined) ++
  294:         [{?eh,test_stats,{1,2,{1,0}}},
  295:          {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_autoskip_require}},
  296:          {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_autoskip_require,
  297:                        {auto_skipped,{require_failed,'_'}}}},
  298:          {?eh,test_stats,{1,2,{1,1}}},
  299:          [{?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,{init_per_group,g,[]}}},
  300:           {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,{init_per_group,g,[]},ok}},
  301:           {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_ok}},
  302:           {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_ok,ok}},
  303:           {?eh,test_stats,{2,2,{1,1}}},
  304:           {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_fail}},
  305:           {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_fail,
  306:                         {failed,{error,{test_case_failed,"this test should fail"}}}}},
  307:           {?eh,test_stats,{2,3,{1,1}}},
  308:           {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_badmatch}},
  309:           {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_badmatch,
  310:                         {failed,{error,{{badmatch,nok},'_'}}}}},
  311:           {?eh,test_stats,{2,4,{1,1}}}] ++
  312:              tc_skip_events(Test,g) ++
  313:              [{?eh,test_stats,{2,4,{2,1}}},
  314:               {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_autoskip_require}},
  315:               {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_autoskip_require,
  316:                             {auto_skipped,{require_failed,'_'}}}},
  317:               {?eh,test_stats,{2,4,{2,2}}},
  318:               {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,{end_per_group,g,[]}}},
  319:               {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,{end_per_group,g,[]},ok}}],
  320:          [{?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,{init_per_group,g_fail,[]}}},
  321:           {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,{init_per_group,g_fail,[]},
  322:                         {failed,{error,all_cases_should_be_skipped}}}},
  323:           {?eh,tc_auto_skip,{surefire_SUITE,{tc_ok,g_fail},
  324:                              {failed,
  325:                               {surefire_SUITE,init_per_group,
  326:                                {'EXIT',all_cases_should_be_skipped}}}}},
  327:           {?eh,test_stats,{2,4,{2,3}}},
  328:           {?eh,tc_auto_skip,{surefire_SUITE,{end_per_group,g_fail},
  329:                              {failed,
  330:                               {surefire_SUITE,init_per_group,
  331:                                {'EXIT',all_cases_should_be_skipped}}}}}],
  332:          {?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
  333:          {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}}].
  334: 
  335: tc_skip_events(skip_case_in_spec,Group) ->
  336:     [{?eh,tc_user_skip,{surefire_SUITE,tc_skip_name(Group),"skipped in spec"}}];
  337: tc_skip_events(_Test,_Group) ->
  338:     [{?eh,tc_start,{surefire_SUITE,tc_skip}},
  339:      {?eh,tc_done,{surefire_SUITE,tc_skip,{skipped,"this test is skipped"}}}].
  340: 
  341: tc_skip_name(undefined) ->
  342:     tc_skip;
  343: tc_skip_name(Group) ->
  344:     {tc_skip,Group}.
  345: 
  346: test_events(fail_pre_init_per_suite) ->
  347:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  348:      {?eh,start_info,{2,2,2}}] ++
  349:      test_suite_events(pass_SUITE) ++
  350:      test_suite_events(fail_SUITE, {1,0,{0,1}}) ++
  351:      [{?eh,stop_logging,[]}];
  352: test_events(skip_suite_in_spec) ->
  353:     [{?eh,start_logging,'_'},{?eh,start_info,{1,1,0}}] ++
  354:      test_suite_events(skip_suite_in_spec) ++
  355:      [{?eh,stop_logging,[]}];
  356: test_events(skip_init_per_group) ->
  357:     [{?eh,start_logging,'_'},{?eh,start_info,{1,1,3}}] ++
  358:      test_suite_events(skip_init_per_group_SUITE) ++
  359:      [{?eh,stop_logging,[]}];
  360: test_events(Test) ->
  361:     [{?eh,start_logging,'_'}, {?eh,start_info,{1,1,11}}] ++
  362:     test_suite_events(Test) ++
  363:     [{?eh,stop_logging,[]}].
  364: 
  365: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  366: %%% Check generated xml log files
  367: check_xml(Case,XmlRe) ->
  368:     case filelib:wildcard(XmlRe) of
  369: 	[] ->
  370: 	    ct:fail("No xml files found with regexp ~tp~n", [XmlRe]);
  371: 	[_] = Xmls when Case==absolute_path ->
  372: 	    do_check_xml(Case,Xmls);
  373: 	[_,_] = Xmls ->
  374: 	    do_check_xml(Case,Xmls)
  375:     end.
  376: 
  377: %% Allowed structure:
  378: %% <testsuites>
  379: %%  <testsuite>
  380: %%   <properties>
  381: %%    <property/>
  382: %%    ...
  383: %%   </properties>
  384: %%   <testcase>
  385: %%    [<failure/> | <error/> | <skipped/> ]
  386: %%   </testcase>
  387: %%   ...
  388: %%  </testsuite>
  389: %%  ...
  390: %% </testsuites>
  391: do_check_xml(Case,[Xml|Xmls]) ->
  392:     ct:log("Checking <a href=~tp>~ts</a>~n",[Xml,Xml]),
  393:     {E,_} = xmerl_scan:file(Xml),
  394:     Expected = events_to_result(lists:flatten(test_events(Case))),
  395:     ParseResult = testsuites(Case,E),
  396:     ct:log("Expecting: ~tp~n",[Expected]),
  397:     ct:log("Actual   : ~tp~n",[ParseResult]),
  398:     Expected = ParseResult,
  399:     do_check_xml(Case,Xmls);
  400: do_check_xml(_,[]) ->
  401:     ok.
  402: 
  403: %% Scanning the XML to get the same type of result as events_to_result/1
  404: testsuites(Case,#xmlElement{name=testsuites,content=TS}) ->
  405:     %% OTP-10589 - move properties element to <testsuite>
  406:     false = lists:keytake(properties,#xmlElement.name,TS),
  407:     testsuite(Case,TS).
  408: 
  409: testsuite(Case,[#xmlElement{name=testsuite,content=TC,attributes=A}|TS]) ->
  410:     TestSuiteEvents =
  411:         test_suite_events(
  412:           case Case of
  413:               skip_suite_in_spec ->
  414:                   skip_suite_in_spec;
  415:               _ ->
  416:                   get_ts_name(A)
  417:           end),
  418:     {ET,EF,ES} = events_to_numbers(lists:flatten(TestSuiteEvents)),
  419:     {T,E,F,S} = get_numbers_from_attrs(A,false,false,false,false),
  420:     ct:log("Expecting total:~p, error:~p, failure:~p, skipped:~p~n",[ET,0,EF,ES]),
  421:     ct:log("Actual    total:~p, error:~p, failure:~p, skipped:~p~n",[T,E,F,S]),
  422:     {ET,0,EF,ES} = {T,E,F,S},
  423: 
  424:     %% properties should only be there if given a options to hook
  425:     false = lists:keytake(properties,#xmlElement.name,TC),
  426:     %% system-out and system-err is not used by common_test
  427:     false = lists:keytake('system-out',#xmlElement.name,TC),
  428:     false = lists:keytake('system-err',#xmlElement.name,TC),
  429:     R=testcase(Case,TC),
  430:     [R|testsuite(Case,TS)];
  431: testsuite(_Case,[]) ->
  432:     [].
  433: 
  434: testcase(url=Case,[#xmlElement{name=testcase,attributes=A,content=C}|TC]) ->
  435:     R = failed_or_skipped(C),
  436:     assert_lines(Case,A),
  437:     case R of
  438: 	[s] ->
  439: 	    case lists:keyfind(url,#xmlAttribute.name,A) of
  440: 		false -> ok;
  441: 		#xmlAttribute{value=UrlAttr} ->
  442: 		    lists:keyfind(url,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  443: 		    true = lists:prefix(?url_base,UrlAttr)
  444: 	    end;
  445: 	_ ->
  446: 	    #xmlAttribute{value=UrlAttr} =
  447: 		lists:keyfind(url,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  448: 	    true = lists:prefix(?url_base,UrlAttr)
  449:     end,
  450:     [R|testcase(Case,TC)];
  451: testcase(Case,[#xmlElement{name=testcase,attributes=A,content=C}|TC]) ->
  452:     false = lists:keyfind(url,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  453:     assert_lines(Case,A),
  454:     R = failed_or_skipped(C),
  455:     [R|testcase(Case,TC)];
  456: testcase(_Case,[]) ->
  457:     [].
  458: 
  459: failed_or_skipped([#xmlElement{name=failure}|E]) ->
  460:     [f|failed_or_skipped(E)];
  461: failed_or_skipped([#xmlElement{name=error}|E]) ->
  462:     [e|failed_or_skipped(E)];
  463: failed_or_skipped([#xmlElement{name=skipped}|E]) ->
  464:     [s|failed_or_skipped(E)];
  465: failed_or_skipped([]) ->
  466:     [].
  467: 
  468: assert_lines(skip_init_per_group, A) ->
  469:     Name = lists:keyfind(name,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  470:     Group = lists:keyfind(group,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  471:     VerifyFun =
  472:         fun ("init_per_group", [{testcase,2}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root") ->
  473:                 ok;
  474:             ("init_per_group", [{testcase,3}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.left") ->
  475:                 ok;
  476:             ("test_case", [{testcase,4}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.left") ->
  477:                 ok;
  478:             ("test_case", [{testcase,5}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.left.nested_group") ->
  479:                 ok;
  480:             ("end_per_group", [{testcase,6}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.left") ->
  481:                 ok;
  482:             ("init_per_group", [{testcase,7}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.right") ->
  483:                 ok;
  484:             ("test_case", [{testcase,8}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.right") ->
  485:                 ok;
  486:             ("end_per_group", [{testcase,9}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root.right") ->
  487:                 ok;
  488:             ("end_per_group", [{testcase,10}, {testsuite,1}, {testsuites,1}], "root") ->
  489:                 ok;
  490:             (Tc, TcParents, TcGroupPath) ->
  491:                 exit({wrong_grouppath, [{tc, Tc},
  492:                                         {tc_parents, TcParents},
  493:                                         {tc_group_path, TcGroupPath}]})
  494:         end,
  495:     case is_record(Group, xmlAttribute) of
  496:         true ->
  497:             Tc = Name#xmlAttribute.value,
  498:             TcParents = Group#xmlAttribute.parents,
  499:             TcGroupPath = Group#xmlAttribute.value,
  500:             VerifyFun(Tc, TcParents, TcGroupPath),
  501:             ok;
  502:         _ ->
  503:             ok
  504:     end;
  505: assert_lines(Case, A) when Case =/= fail_pre_init_per_suite,
  506:                            Case =/= skip_case_in_spec,
  507:                            Case =/= skip_suite_in_spec ->
  508:     Name = lists:keyfind(name,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  509:     File = lists:keyfind(file,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  510:     Line = lists:keyfind(line,#xmlAttribute.name,A),
  511:     ?assertMatch("surefire_SUITE.erl",filename:basename(File#xmlAttribute.value)),
  512:     case Name#xmlAttribute.value of
  513:         "init_per_suite" ->
  514:             ?assertMatch("51", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  515:         "end_per_suite" ->
  516:             ?assertMatch("54", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  517:         "tc_ok" ->
  518:             ?assertMatch("80", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  519:         "tc_fail" ->
  520:             ?assertMatch("85", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  521:         "tc_badmatch" ->
  522:             ?assertMatch("89", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  523:         "tc_skip" ->
  524:             ?assertMatch("91", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  525:         "tc_autoskip_require" ->
  526:             ?assertMatch("96", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  527:         "init_per_group" ->
  528:             ?assertMatch("57", Line#xmlAttribute.value);
  529:         "end_per_group" ->
  530:             ?assertMatch("62", Line#xmlAttribute.value)
  531:     end;
  532: assert_lines(_, _) ->
  533:     ok.
  534: 
  535: 
  536: %% Using the expected events to produce the expected result of the XML scanning.
  537: %% The result is a list of test suites:
  538: %% Testsuites = [Testsuite]
  539: %% Testsuite = [Testcase]
  540: %% Testcase = [] | [f] | [s], indicating ok, failed and skipped respectively
  541: events_to_result(E) ->
  542:     events_to_result(E, []).
  543: 
  544: events_to_result([{?eh,tc_user_skip,{_Suite,all,_}}|E], Result) ->
  545:     events_to_result(E, [[[s]]|Result]);
  546: events_to_result([{?eh,tc_auto_skip,{_Suite,init_per_suite,_}}|E], Result) ->
  547:     {Suite,Rest} = events_to_result1(E),
  548:     events_to_result(Rest, [[[s]|Suite]|Result]);
  549: events_to_result([{?eh,tc_done,{_Suite,init_per_suite,R}}|E], Result) ->
  550:     {Suite,Rest} = events_to_result1(E),
  551:     events_to_result(Rest, [[result(R)|Suite]|Result]);
  552: events_to_result([_|E], Result) ->
  553:     events_to_result(E, Result);
  554: events_to_result([], Result) ->
  555:     Result.
  556: 
  557: events_to_result1([{?eh,tc_auto_skip,{_Suite, end_per_suite,_}}|E]) ->
  558:     {[[s]],E};
  559: events_to_result1([{?eh,tc_done,{_Suite, end_per_suite,R}}|E]) ->
  560:     {[result(R)],E};
  561: events_to_result1([{?eh,tc_done,{_Suite,_Case,R}}|E]) ->
  562:     {Suite,Rest} = events_to_result1(E),
  563:     {[result(R)|Suite],Rest};
  564: events_to_result1([{?eh,Skip,_}|E]) when Skip==tc_auto_skip; Skip==tc_user_skip ->
  565:     {Suite,Rest} = events_to_result1(E),
  566:     {[[s]|Suite],Rest};
  567: events_to_result1([_|E]) ->
  568:     events_to_result1(E).
  569: 
  570: result(ok) ->[];
  571: result({skipped,_}) -> [s];
  572: result({auto_skipped,_}) -> [s];
  573: result({failed,_}) -> [f].
  574: 
  575: %% Using the expected events' last test_stats element to produce the
  576: %% expected number of totla, errors, failed and skipped testcases.
  577: events_to_numbers(E) ->
  578:     RevE = lists:reverse(E),
  579:     {?eh,test_stats,{Ok,F,{US,AS}}} = lists:keyfind(test_stats,2,RevE),
  580:     {Ok+F+US+AS,F,US+AS}.
  581: 
  582: get_numbers_from_attrs([#xmlAttribute{name=tests,value=X}|A],false,E,F,S) ->
  583:     get_numbers_from_attrs(A,list_to_integer(X),E,F,S);
  584: get_numbers_from_attrs([#xmlAttribute{name=errors,value=X}|A],T,false,F,S) ->
  585:     get_numbers_from_attrs(A,T,list_to_integer(X),F,S);
  586: get_numbers_from_attrs([#xmlAttribute{name=failures,value=X}|A],T,E,false,S) ->
  587:     get_numbers_from_attrs(A,T,E,list_to_integer(X),S);
  588: get_numbers_from_attrs([#xmlAttribute{name=skipped,value=X}|A],T,E,F,false) ->
  589:     get_numbers_from_attrs(A,T,E,F,list_to_integer(X));
  590: get_numbers_from_attrs([_|A],T,E,F,S) ->
  591:     get_numbers_from_attrs(A,T,E,F,S);
  592: get_numbers_from_attrs([],T,E,F,S) ->
  593:     {T,E,F,S}.
  594: 
  595: ensure_exists_empty(Dir) ->
  596:     case file:list_dir(Dir) of
  597: 	{error,enoent} ->
  598: 	    file:make_dir(Dir);
  599: 	{ok,Files} ->
  600: 	    del_files(Dir,Files)
  601:     end.
  602: 
  603: del_files(Dir,[F0|Fs] ) ->
  604:     F = filename:join(Dir,F0),
  605:     case file:read_file_info(F) of
  606: 	{ok,#file_info{type=directory}} ->
  607: 	    {ok,Files} = file:list_dir(F),
  608: 	    del_files(F,Files),
  609: 	    file:del_dir(F),
  610: 	    del_files(Dir,Fs);
  611: 	_ ->
  612: 	    file:delete(F),
  613: 	    del_files(Dir,Fs)
  614:     end;
  615: del_files(_,[]) ->
  616:     ok.
  617: 
  618: get_ts_name(Attributes) ->
  619:     {_,name,_,_,_,_,_,_,Name,_} = lists:keyfind(name, 2, Attributes),
  620:     list_to_atom(Name).
